metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7653 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The Eclipse Mosquitto broker up to version 1.4.15 does not reject strings that are not valid UTF-8. A malicious client could cause other clients that do reject invalid UTF-8 strings to disconnect themselves from the broker by sending a topic string which is not valid UTF-8, and so cause a denial of service for the clients.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7653` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmosquitto1 - 1.4.8-1ubuntu0.16.04.7
libmosquittopp1 - 1.4.8-1ubuntu0.16.04.7
mosquitto - 1.4.8-1ubuntu0.16.04.7
mosquitto-clients - 1.4.8-1ubuntu0.16.04.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mosquitto package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.8-1ubuntu0.16.04.7').
